description: This Kotlin source file defines the HomeActivity class for an Android TV application. It manages the UI components such as the top menu and multiple horizontal rails displaying posters, including setup for focus navigation and navigation actions.

classes.name: Poster
classes.description: A simple data class representing a poster with an ID.

classes.name: PosterAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Poster items in a horizontal list.

classes.name: PosterViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder for Poster items in the RecyclerView.

classes.name: HomeActivity
classes.description: Main activity for the Android TV app, managing UI components such as top menu and poster rails.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and calls setup methods for the top menu and rails.

methods.name: setupTopMenu
methods.description: Configures the top menu buttons and their click actions, including navigation to LoginActivity.

methods.name: setupRails
methods.description: Sets up multiple horizontal rails with posters, assigning titles and adapters.
